scripts.merge-all: bash -lc "cur=$(git branch --show-current); for b in $(git for-each-ref --format='%(refname:short)' refs/heads/ | grep -vE '^(main|development)$'); do git checkout \"$b\" && git merge \"$cur\"; done && git push --all"
scripts.merge-all-local: bash -lc "cur=$(git branch --show-current); for b in $(git for-each-ref --format='%(refname:short)' refs/heads/ | grep -vE '^(main|development)$'); do git checkout \"$b\" && git merge \"$cur\"; done"
